programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Two talented chefs go head-to-head for the chance to Beat Bobby Flay. To get to Bobby the chefs must first face off against each other, creating a spectacular dish with a secret ingredient of Bobbys choice. Judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Jeff Mauro know Bobbys strengths and his weaknesses. Their goal: Pick the chef who has the skills to take down Bobby Flay in his own arena. The winning chef gets to challenge Bobby with his or her surprise signature dish. If Bobby goes down, the winner can tell the world, "I beat Bobby Flay!"

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: In Food Networks series Kids Baking Championship, hosts and judges Duff Goldman and Valerie Bertinelli will lead eight talented kid bakers through challenges designed to find the most-impressive and creative young baker. In each challenge the contestants, ranging in age from 10 to 13, will be tested on their baking skills and originality as they whip up delectable desserts, including creative cakes, mouthwatering cookies and pastries.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri digs in diner style with mighty mac n cheese in Atlanta, brisket hash in San Antonio and a supreme breakfast burrito in Scottsdale, AZ.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri heads back for a taste of Thailand in Boulder, CO, Pakistani favourites in Tempe, AZ, and Moroccan specialties in San Antonio.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: In Food Networks series Kids Baking Championship, hosts and judges Duff Goldman and Valerie Bertinelli will lead eight talented kid bakers through challenges designed to find the most-impressive and creative young baker. In each challenge the contestants, ranging in age from 10 to 13, will be tested on their baking skills and originality as they whip up delectable desserts, including creative cakes, mouthwatering cookies and pastries.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri digs in diner style with mighty mac n cheese in Atlanta, brisket hash in San Antonio and a supreme breakfast burrito in Scottsdale, AZ.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 1. Twenty-four elite chefs enter the arena where they will spend the next 24 hours cooking, and theyll have to use their speed to impress judge Jet Tila.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Two talented chefs go head-to-head for the chance to Beat Bobby Flay. To get to Bobby the chefs must first face off against each other, creating a spectacular dish with a secret ingredient of Bobbys choice. Judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Jeff Mauro know Bobbys strengths and his weaknesses. Their goal: Pick the chef who has the skills to take down Bobby Flay in his own arena. The winning chef gets to challenge Bobby with his or her surprise signature dish. If Bobby goes down, the winner can tell the world, "I beat Bobby Flay!"

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: In Food Networks series Kids Baking Championship, hosts and judges Duff Goldman and Valerie Bertinelli will lead eight talented kid bakers through challenges designed to find the most-impressive and creative young baker. programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri heads back for a taste of Thailand in Boulder, CO, Pakistani favourites in Tempe, AZ, and Moroccan specialties in San Antonio.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Symon
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: In Food Networks series Kids Baking Championship, hosts and judges Duff Goldman and Valerie Bertinelli will lead eight talented kid bakers through challenges designed to find the most-impressive and creative young baker. In each challenge the contestants, ranging in age from 10 to 13, will be tested on their baking skills and originality as they whip up delectable desserts, including creative cakes, mouthwatering cookies and pastries.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Battle Of the Decades
programme.desc: In this all-new series, teams comprised of two chefs from different generations will tackle challenges in which they must mesh retro ingredients with todays viral food trends to bridge the culinary gap and show off their expertise.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps host as pairs of professional bakers create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual Harry Potter film sets. Guest actors from the films share behind-the-scenes experiences as they join judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: In Food Networks series Kids Baking Championship, hosts and judges Duff Goldman and Valerie Bertinelli will lead eight talented kid bakers through challenges designed to find the most-impressive and creative young baker. In each challenge the contestants, ranging in age from 10 to 13, will be tested on their baking skills and originality as they whip up delectable desserts, including creative cakes, mouthwatering cookies and pastries.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: News reports
programme.desc: News Reports presents the days most important stories with clear and impartial coverage. Updates from politics, business, and global affairs are delivered through live reports, expert commentary, and concise analysis, giving viewers a reliable overview of events shaping the agenda. Every day. Trusted source.

programme.title: News reports
programme.desc: News Reports presents the days most important stories with clear and impartial coverage. Updates from politics, business, and global affairs are delivered through live reports, expert commentary, and concise analysis, giving viewers a reliable overview of events shaping the agenda. Every day. Trusted source.

programme.title: Karstais pārītis: apbruņotas un apburošas
programme.desc: Viņas ir pilnīgi pretstati - FIB aģente Sāra un Bostonas policiste Šenona. Lai atmaskotu un noķertu starptautiskas nozīmes noziedznieku, tieši viņām ir jākļūst par pāriniecēm. Pēc sākotnējām nesaskaņām un neskaitāmiem komiskiem starpgadījumiem Sārai un Šenonai izdodas kļūt par vienotu komandu - apbruņotas ar neparedzamo sieviešu loģiku un spējīgas apburt jebkuru, karstais pārītis kļūst par nāvējošu ieroci noziedzīgajai pasaulei. Galvenajā lomās Melisa Makārtija un Sandra Buloka.

programme.title: Iesācēja
programme.desc: Studente Aleksa vēlas būt pirmā it visā. Viņa piesakās universitātes airēšanas komandā, un pavisam drīz viņai rodas iespēja pārbaudīt savas fiziskās un psiholoģiskās spējas.

programme.title: Kamēr mēs esam jauni
programme.desc: Bezbērnu pārim šķiet, ka draugi no viņiem attālinās. Tāpēc viņi iepazīstas ar kādu jaunu pāri, kam ir simtiem traku ideju. Šķiet, ka viņiem nav nekā kopēja. Tomēr nekad nav par vēlu justies jaunam!

programme.title: Imigrante
programme.desc: 1921. gads. Nevainīga imigrante ar viltu tiek iemānīta burlesku un vodeviļas pasaulē, līdz kāds žilbinošs burvju mākslinieks mēģina viņu glābt un palīdz atrast sievietes māsu, kas tiek turēta karantīnā Elisa salā.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: 10 dzīvības
programme.desc: Lutināts kaķis Bekets par pašsaprotamu uzskata laimīgo lozi, kas viņam iedalīta, kopš viņu izglāba un iemīlēja Roza, labsirdīga un aizrautīga studente. Kad kaķis zaudē savu devīto dzīvību, liktenis iejaucas, lai viņu aizvestu pārmācošā piedzīvojumā.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets
programme.desc: Dienā, kad zobenzobu vāveri vajā neveiksmes un viņa gandrīz pazaudē savu lielāko dārgumu ozolzīli, visi dzīvnieki dodas ceļā uz dienvidiem, meklējot glābiņu no aukstuma, kas piemeklējis zemi. Sliņķis Sids un mamuts Manfreds par ceļabiedriem kļūst nejauši. Pēc zobenzobu tīģeru uzbrukuma cilvēku apmetnei viņi izglābj mazuli. Par to rūpes uzņemas citkārt slinkais Sids un, kaut gan diezgan negribīgi, arī Manfreds. Nospriežot, ka bērna tētis ir dzīvs, viņi dodas to meklēt. Drīz ceļiniekiem pievienojas arī zobenzobu tīģeris Djego, kura uzdevums ir mazuli nolaupīt. Tā sākas draugu aizraujošais ceļojums, kura laikā visnepiemērotākajos brīžos pie apvāršņa parādās zobenzobu vāvere Skrets, izmisīgi cenzdamies glābt savu ozolzīli.

programme.title: Kungfu panda
programme.desc: Panda, vārdā Po, strādā nūdeļu restorānā. Viņš sapņo kļūt par slavenu kungfu meistaru, jo ir kaislīgs kungfu fans, taču Po ķermeņa apmēri īsti neatbilst šim sapnim. Un ja tā pavisam godīgi, – pandas ir slinkākie dzīvnieki visā Ķīnā. Tomēr, kad pilsētai tuvojas ienaidnieks, visu cerības balstās senā pareģojumā par kādu Po, kurš izrādīsies "izredzētais" un visus izglābs. Austrumu cīņu meistariem nāksies bruņoties ar milzu pacietību, lai slinkuma maisu Po padarītu par kungfu cīkstoni.

programme.title: Kungfu panda
programme.desc: Pandumānija turpinās! Kļuvis par varoni, panda Po nu kopā ar saviem draugiem Tīģerieni, Dzērvi, Čūsku, Pērtiķi un Dievlūdzēju aizsargā dzimto ieleju un tās iemītniekus. Taču Po mierīgajai dzīvei tiek pielikts punkts brīdī, kad uzrodas ļaundaris, kurš, liekot lietā noslēpumainu spēku, grib pakļaut Ķīnu. Pandai kopā ar draugiem būs jādodas cauri visai Ķīnai, lai uzveiktu pretinieku.

programme.title: Kungfu Panda
programme.desc: Po (Džeks Bleks) satiek savu sen pazudušo tēvu Lī (Braiens Kranstons), un abi dodas uz rezervātu, kurā sastop dažus smieklīgus ekscentriķus. Tomēr, kad uzrodas noslēpumainais ļaundaris Kajs (Džeikejs Simonss) - ļauns bullis, kurš zog kung fu meistaru dzīvības spēku - Po ir jāapmāca savi neveiklie sugas brāļi kung fu kaujas mākslā.

programme.title: Madagaskara
programme.desc: Iemīļotie animācijas filmas "Madagaskara" varoņi ir atgriezušies! Pingvīni, liekot lietā teju vai militāru precizitāti un visus iespējamos līdzekļus, ir saremontējuši vecu, reiz avarējušu lidmašīnu. Iecerēts, ka tieši tajā pazīstamie Madagaskaras varoņi dosies atpakaļ uz mājām - uz Ņujorku. Plāns ir labs, taču drīz vien Alekss, Mārtijs, Melmans, Glorija un pingvīnu komanda strauji piezemējas mežonīgajos Āfrikas plašumos, kur zoodārzā augusī četrotne pirmoreiz satiek savus sugas brāļus. Kāds no viņiem šeit atradīs savus radus, citam būs romantiski piedzīvojumi, bet nav gan zināms, vai Āfrika būs labāka par viņu mājām Centrālparka zoodārzā...

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Panda Mēness
programme.desc: Pēc sliktām atzīmēm 12 gadus vecais Tiaņs tiek nosūtīts pie vecmāmiņas uz attāliem Ķīnas kalniem. Tur viņš sadraudzējas ar pandu, kuru nosauc par Mēnesi, un šī draudzība aizsāk neparastu piedzīvojumu, kas izmaina viņa ģimenes dzīvi.

programme.title: Es esmu Rozīte
programme.desc: Leģendārā ielu modes ikona Rozīte klejojusi pa Lietuvas galvaspilsētas ielām vairākas desmitgades, iepriecinot garāmgājējus un tūristus. Vasaras nomainījuši rudeņi, ziemas – pavasari. Rozīte nerādās Viļņā. Viņas vientulīgās dienas iegaismo fotogrāfa ierašanās Neringā.

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: Vēl pa vienai
programme.desc: Oskarotā Tomasa Vinterberga filma par četriem draugiem un kolēģiem, ģimnāzijas skolotājiem. Visi četri cīnās ar nemotivētiem skolēniem un jūtas iestrēguši rutīnā. Nikolaja 40 gadu jubilejā draugu sarunas noved pie norvēģu psihiatra Finna Skorderuda teorijas, ka cilvēks dzīvo ar 0,05 promiļu iztrūkumu. Četrotne nolemj veikt eksperimentu un pārbaudīt šo teoriju dzīvē. Tomēr, eksperimentam turpinoties, vīri sastopas katrs ar savu personīgās dzīves izaicinājumu.

programme.title: Pārdabiskais Venēcijā
programme.desc: "Pārdabiskais Venēcijā" ir asinis stindzinošs stāsts par slavenā detektīva Erkila Puaro atgriešanos. Ir beidzies Otrais pasaules karš, Puaro ir pensijā un dzīvo labprātīgā trimdā pasaules krāšņākajā pilsētā Venēcijā. Viņš nelabprāt apmeklē spiritisma seansu kādā vecā, spokainā pilī, taču, kad kāds no viesiem tiek noslepkavots, detektīvs negaidīti nonāk draudīgā ēnu un noslēpumu pasaules virpulī. Filmas pamatā ir Agatas Kristi grāmata "Veciem grēkiem garas ēnas".

programme.title: Viktorīnu lēdija
programme.desc: Ar spēļu viktorīnām apsēsta sieviete kopā ar atsvešinājušos māsu kopīgi strādā, lai palīdzētu segt savas mātes azartspēļu parādus.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Grū ģimenē ir papildinājums - Grū juniors. Kad tētis Grū sastopas ar jaunu ienaidnieku – atriebīgo Maksimu Lemālu un viņa liktenīgo sievieti Valentīnu –, visa ģimene ir spiesta atstāt mājas, doties uz slepeno mītni skaistajā Meifloverā un mēģināt iekļauties vietējā sabiedrībā zem slepena vārda. Taču te ir kāds, kas zina, kas patiesībā ir Grū, un piedzīvojumi var sākties!

programme.title: Gudričs
programme.desc: Andija Gudriča dzīve tiek apgriezta kājām gaisā, kad viņa sieva uzsāk rehabilitācijas programmu, atstājot viņu vienu ar viņu mazajiem bērniem. Gudričs paļaujas uz Greisu, savu meitu no pirmās laulības, un galu galā kļūst par tēvu, kāds viņai nekad nav bijis.

programme.title: Gambīts
programme.desc: Mākslas kuratoram Harijam Dīnam ik dienu nākas paciest sava līdz ausīm bagātā priekšnieka Laionela ekscentriskās izdarības. Nu viņš plāno atriebties, taču šim uzdevumam viņam ir vajadzīga karstasinīgas rodeo karalienes Pīdžejas palīdzība. Harijs liek senam draugam izgatavot pazudušas Monē gleznas kopiju un pamudina priekšnieku to "nejauši" ievērot. Ja darījums izdosies, Harijs un viņa līdzdalībnieki būs par dažiem miljoniem mārciņu bagātāki.

programme.title: Amerikas maģisko melnādaino biedrība
programme.desc: Jauns vīrietis tiek uzņemts noslēpumainā biedrībā, kurā darbojas maģiski melnādainie cilvēki, kas veltī savu dzīvi augstākā mērķa īstenošanai: atvieglot baltajiem cilvēkiem dzīvi.

programme.title: Zeks un Vovo: Leģendāra leģenda
programme.desc: Iedomu pasaules sirdī, kurā mīt fantastiskas būtnes un bīstami briesmoņi, 13 gadus vecais Zaks dodas meklēt savu dvīņu brāli Kailu, kurš noslēpumaini pazudis.

programme.title: Marija
programme.desc: Marija Kallasa, pasaulē izcilākā operdziedātāja, pavada savas dzīves pēdējās dienas 70. gadu Parīzē, saskaroties ar savu identitāti.

programme.title: Kaut tu būtu šeit
programme.desc: Jauna dāma, meklējot dzīvei uguntiņu, pavada romantisku nakti kopā ar kādu jaunekli. Atklādama, ka vīrietis ir nedziedināmi slims, sieviete apņemas palīdzēt viņam pilnvērtīgi nodzīvot pēdējās šeit atvēlētās dienas.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 3: Dinozauru ēra
programme.desc: Filmu "Ledus laikmets" un "Ledus Laikmets 2" varoņi ir atgriezušies - gatavi jauniem piedzīvojumiem. Skrets joprojām nododas nenotveramās zīles medībām. Menijs un Elija gaida mazuļa piedzimšanu, sliņķis Sids mēģina iztēloties ģimenes dzīvi, rūpējoties par nočieptām dinozaura olām, bet zobenzobu tīģeris Djego apsver, vai viņš nav kļuvis pārāk mīkstčaulīgs, tik daudz laika pavadot draugu kompānijā. Dodoties glābt nelaimē nokļuvušo Sidu, draugi nokļūst neparastā pazemes pasaulē, kur aci pret aci sastopas ar dinozauriem un ir spiesti cīnīties gan ar zvēriem, gan augiem.

programme.title: Rozalīna
programme.desc: Ikviens zina stāstu par Romeo un Džuljetu. Taču šajā stāstā iztrūkst kāda svarīga nianse – pirms Džuljetas bija viņas māsīca Rozalīna. Rozalīna ir līdz ausīm iemīlējusies Romeo un ir pārliecināta, ka abi ir kā radīti viens otram. Gadiem ilgi Rozalīna sapņo, kaut Romeo viņu noskūpstītu, un tad tas patiešām notiek! Viss šķiet ideāli, taču tad viņas māsīca Džuljeta pārceļas atpakaļ uz pilsētu un iekaro Romeo sirdi. Un tas vēl nav viss – Rozalīna uzzina par Džuljetas un Romeo pašnāvības plāniem. Vai viņa pagūs abus apturēt?

programme.title: Advokāts
programme.desc: Veiksmīgais advokāts ir sasniedzis savas karjeras augstāko punktu un atradis liktenīgo sievieti, ar kuru vēlas drīz precēties. Viņa mierīgo dzīvi iztraucē senas paziņas lūgums. Piekrītot šim piedāvājumam, advokātam nāksies pieņemt lēmumus, kas neatbilst viņa principiem un morāles normām. Viņš vēl nemaz nenojauš, ka, iesaistoties amorālajā narkobiznesā, viņa dzīve izmainīsies līdz nepazīšanai. Filmā piedalās krāšņs aktieru ansamblis - Maikls Fasbenders, Penelope Krusa, Kemerone Diasa, Havjers Bardems un Breds Pits.

programme.title: Augstuma ķīlnieki
programme.desc: Pilots transportē maršali, kas pavada uz prāvu bēgli. Kad viņi šķērso Aļaskas savvaļu, pieaug spriedze un tiek pārbaudīta uzticība, jo ne visi lidmašīnā ir tie, par ko uzdodas.

programme.title: Sarkanā Džoana
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par krievu spiedzi, kas novērsa Trešo Pasaules karu. Britu izlūkdienests ilgus gadus centās viņu atklāt, viņas vārds kļuva par leģendu. Tomēr par šo viņas varoņdarbu sabiedrība uzzināja pavisam nesen, kad lietai tika noņemts slepenības grifs.

programme.title: Absolūtā patiesība
programme.desc: 17 gadus vecais Maiks Lesiters apsūdzēts sava turīgā tēva slepkavībā. Lai gan pierādījumi pret apsūdzēto ir šķietami neapgāžami, viņa aizstāvības advokāts Ričards Remzijs gatavs darīt visu, lai Maiku attaisnotu. Ar jaunās advokātes Dženelas palīdzību viņš dara visu iespējamo, lai noskaidrotu, kas īsti notika slepkavības dienā.

programme.title: Futbols: Ligue 1. PSG - Marseille
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Villarreal - Espanyol
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. St. Pauli - Stuttgart
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Valencia - Real Madrid
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: UFC. Mario Bautista-Vinicius Oliveira
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Italiano
programme.desc: Dave and Jenny journey to Italys Tuscan countryside from their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas, to revitalize a grand villa for longtime friends. The six-episode season documents the Marrs, who first visited Italy as newlyweds, as they execute a monumental restoration of the centuries-old property. Inspired by the rich history, rolling hillsides and leafy olive groves of the region, Dave and Jenny will rely on the help of local builders, architects and artisans to meet historic building regulations and source authentic materials such as handmade terracotta tiles, olive wood floors and Carrara marble. Bringing this behemoth renovation across the finish line will take all the grit, determination and building savvy they can muster to overcome language barriers, months of delays, budget restraints, looming deadlines and an immense amount of pressure.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.desc: Husband and wife design build team, Richie Morris and Georgia Ezra, create one-of-a-kind, modern designs and bespoke spaces for their clients in Melbourne, Australia while juggling their thriving businesses and family of four.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

Reality series.

programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Matt Blashaw realizes couples wishes to own a vacation home mortgage free. The secret? He helps them shop for and renovate a "diamond in the rough" home in their dream location to command top dollar as a vacation rental. The end result? The couple rents out the renovated home for maximum income part of the year, covering all their annual expenses. For the rest of the year they live in a Vacation House for Free!

programme.title: Windy City Rehab: Alisons Dream Home
programme.desc: Alisons big idea turns into a big problem when she doesnt have the money for her biggest personal renovation ever. Will she be able to pull it off?

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: A couple attempts the daunting renovation of a tri-plex in Baltimore only to be met with unexpected setbacks that test their resolve and finances.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: A family of four transforms the outdated Texas home they just purchased into a vibrant space that reflects their recent years spent in Hawaii.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Follow award-winning actor Laurence Fishburne as he guides you through a number of mysteries that confused humanity for years, attempting to investigate what really happened, while looking at some new clues and leads. This documentary programme will try to answer some interesting and enduring questions, such as what was the true reason the Titanic sank, what happened to D.B. Cooper, did John Wilkes Booth fake his death, and many more.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a retired Army aviation officer uncover evidence of intelligent anomalies or technosignatures, in NASA archived solar satellite photos? Did a group of explorers discover the best evidence of extraterrestrial contact on Earth in a Mexican cave?

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. Employing the assistance of experts and state-of-the-art technology, Tony is determined to decipher whether these photos, videos and audio recordings of purported supernatural and paranormal events are falsified or for real. He meets with eyewitnesses, conducts tests and stops at nothing to determine the truth.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Follow award-winning actor Laurence Fishburne as he guides you through a number of mysteries that confused humanity for years, attempting to investigate what really happened, while looking at some new clues and leads. This documentary programme will try to answer some interesting and enduring questions, such as what was the true reason the Titanic sank, what happened to D.B. Cooper, did John Wilkes Booth fake his death, and many more.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For two months out of every year, a group of exceptional men find their way to the Canadian tundra to undertake one of the most dangerous jobs on earth. In the thick of winter, truckers in giant eighteen wheelers carry vital equipment and supplies to miners hundreds of miles away. In blizzard conditions, these truckers travel over ice roads that often take them over frozen lakes. Each man is trained in self survival, from fixing his truck in sub zero conditions in seconds to escaping from a truck if the ice cracks. On the other end of the journey are miners whose lives depend on the truckers making it to their base, year after year.

programme.desc: For two months out of every year, a group of exceptional men find their way to the Canadian tundra to undertake one of the most dangerous jobs on earth. In the thick of winter, truckers in giant eighteen wheelers carry vital equipment and supplies to miners hundreds of miles away. In blizzard conditions, these truckers travel over ice roads that often take them over frozen lakes. Each man is trained in self survival, from fixing his truck in sub zero conditions in seconds to escaping from a truck if the ice cracks. On the other end of the journey are miners whose lives depend on the truckers making it to their base, year after year.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 is smart, fun countdown that details how ancient technology worked, how surprisingly advanced it was, and how it was kind of awesome. Location shooting, CGI, and graphics are pulled from past History series Ancient Impossible and Ancient Discoveries, and lists are organized by themes. The stories are augmented by new entries fueled by the History archive. Episodes include updated "Top Ten" graphics and new interviews that provide "wow" facts and explain why something made the list. The lists will have organizing principles so it doesnt seem arbitrary. Episodes could include the following: Top 10 Secrets of Egypt, Top 10 Ancient Vikings, Top 10 Greek Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Weapons, Top 10 Ancient Monuments, Top 10 Ancient Ships, Top 10 Torture Devices, Top 10 Roman Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Swords, and Top 10 Ancient Sieges.

programme.title: Pirate Treasure of the Knights Templar
programme.desc: In this series, renowned underwater archaeologist and adventurer Barry Clifford, along with a crack team of on-land explorers and experts, attempts to solve a mystery that dates back hundreds of years.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: In December of 2017, The New York Times published a stunning front-page expose about the Pentagons mysterious UFO program, the Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). Featuring an interview with a former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge, Luis Elizondo, who confirmed the existence of the hidden government program, the controversial story was the focus of worldwide attention. Previously run by Elizondo, AATIP was created to research and investigate Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) including numerous videos of reported encounters, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. Elizondo resigned after expressing to the government that these UAPs could pose a major threat to our national security and not enough was being done to deal with them or address our potential vulnerabilities. Now, as a part of HISTORYs groundbreaking new six-part, one-hour limited series UNIDENTIFIED: INSIDE AMERICAS UFO INVESTIGATION, Elizondo is speaking out for the first time with Tom DeLonge, co-founder and President of To The Stars Academy of Arts and Science and Chris Mellon, former Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense and Intelligence, to expose a series of startling encounters and embark on fascinating new investigations that will urge the public to ask questions and look for answers. The series will reveal newly authenticated evidence and footage, interviews from eyewitnesses and former military personnel who have never spoken out before, and extensive breakthroughs in understanding the technology behind these unknown phenomena in our skies.

programme.title: The Best of MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Something strange is killing animals and sucking the blood from its victims. Is this creature the mysterious Chupacabra of legend, or a gruesome new hybrid mutation?

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Reality series following the adventures of Egyptologist Dr Zahi Hawass and his team as they search for the secrets of ancient Egypt. Travelling across this fascinating country, Dr Zahi Hawass and his crew embark on a historical and archaeological expedition – and try to preserve important artefacts.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 is smart, fun countdown that details how ancient technology worked, how surprisingly advanced it was, and how it was kind of awesome. Location shooting, CGI, and graphics are pulled from past History series Ancient Impossible and Ancient Discoveries, and lists are organized by themes. The stories are augmented by new entries fueled by the History archive. Episodes include updated "Top Ten" graphics and new interviews that provide "wow" facts and explain why something made the list. The lists will have organizing principles so it doesnt seem arbitrary. Episodes could include the following: Top 10 Secrets of Egypt, Top 10 Ancient Vikings, Top 10 Greek Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Weapons, Top 10 Ancient Monuments, Top 10 Ancient Ships, Top 10 Torture Devices, Top 10 Roman Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Swords, and Top 10 Ancient Sieges.

programme.title: Pirate Treasure of the Knights Templar
programme.desc: In this series, renowned underwater archaeologist and adventurer Barry Clifford, along with a crack team of on-land explorers and experts, attempts to solve a mystery that dates back hundreds of years.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: In December of 2017, The New York Times published a stunning front-page expose about the Pentagons mysterious UFO program, the Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). Featuring an interview with a former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge, Luis Elizondo, who confirmed the existence of the hidden government program, the controversial story was the focus of worldwide attention. Previously run by Elizondo, AATIP was created to research and investigate Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) including numerous videos of reported encounters, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. Elizondo resigned after expressing to the government that these UAPs could pose a major threat to our national security and not enough was being done to deal with them or address our potential vulnerabilities. Now, as a part of HISTORYs groundbreaking new six-part, one-hour limited series UNIDENTIFIED: INSIDE AMERICAS UFO INVESTIGATION, Elizondo is speaking out for the first time with Tom DeLonge, co-founder and President of To The Stars Academy of Arts and Science and Chris Mellon, former Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense and Intelligence, to expose a series of startling encounters and embark on fascinating new investigations that will urge the public to ask questions and look for answers. The series will reveal newly authenticated evidence and footage, interviews from eyewitnesses and former military personnel who have never spoken out before, and extensive breakthroughs in understanding the technology behind these unknown phenomena in our skies.

programme.title: The Best of MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Something strange is killing animals and sucking the blood from its victims. Is this creature the mysterious Chupacabra of legend, or a gruesome new hybrid mutation?

programme.title: The Best of MonsterQuest

programme.title: Rome: Rise and Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: A thirteen hour series which focuses on the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars with Rome which ultimately led to the decline and fall of the Roman Empire. This series is centered on the campaigns and battles with the barbarian tribes and extensive examinations of the reigns of little known Roman emperors and generals. The significance and structures of key barbarian tribes and the roles their leaders played are explored in detail. Territorial changes to the Roman Empire caused by unrelenting wars, plagues, mass starvations and power struggles are presented in chronological historical context with extensive re-enactments. This series examines how the continuous wars with the barbarians and depletion of resources became a core cause of the Roman Empires decline and eventual collapse.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: If you have ever wondered how egg rolls are mass produced or what is inside a hamburger, have a look at the Food Tech hosted by Bobby Bognar. Bobby have worked in the food industry and restaurants most of his life, and is in love with food. In every episode he makes a preparation of a well-known American meal and tracks the ingredients from the field or factory to your plate, presenting fantastic stories hiding behind your favourite food.

programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Project Impossible
programme.desc: Project Impossible is an original series that follows a new generation of epic engineering projects that were considered unthinkable just a few years ago. Each episode of Project Impossible features multiple stories that illustrate man-made projects that are crucial to our future. These projects include a massive North Sea wind station with 600-foot rotors, a giant sea wall that will protect the ancient city of Venice from rising waters, the worlds largest moveable structure in Chernobyl, and the construction of a fleet of nuclear powered icebreaking ships.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: The Hunt for Baltic Gold
programme.desc: Amber has been coveted in Poland since the 15th century, when handmade jewellery incorporating this semi-precious stone (even though it is not a stone) was sought after by members of the Royal, Imperial, Papal and Ottoman Courts. With 70% of the worlds amber being produced in Poland, the industry is still thriving, especially in the coastal areas around the port city of Gdansk. The viewer will learn about the journey of amber, from its origins as fossilized tree resin to its extraction from the ground and its transfromation into creative and beautiful decorations. The show also tells the story of the people who work in the industry and the difficulties they face in harvesting the amber, getting it to market and selling it.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: In December of 2017, The New York Times published a stunning front-page expose about the Pentagons mysterious UFO program, the Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). Featuring an interview with a former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge, Luis Elizondo, who confirmed the existence of the hidden government program, the controversial story was the focus of worldwide attention. Previously run by Elizondo, AATIP was created to research and investigate Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) including numerous videos of reported encounters, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. Elizondo resigned after expressing to the government that these UAPs could pose a major threat to our national security and not enough was being done to deal with them or address our potential vulnerabilities. Now, as a part of HISTORYs groundbreaking new six-part, one-hour limited series UNIDENTIFIED: INSIDE AMERICAS UFO INVESTIGATION, Elizondo is speaking out for the first time with Tom DeLonge, co-founder and President of To The Stars Academy of Arts and Science and Chris Mellon, former Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense and Intelligence, to expose a series of startling encounters and embark on fascinating new investigations that will urge the public to ask questions and look for answers. The series will reveal newly authenticated evidence and footage, interviews from eyewitnesses and former military personnel who have never spoken out before, and extensive breakthroughs in understanding the technology behind these unknown phenomena in our skies.

programme.title: The Best of MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In legends, theyre called krakens: enormous squid with tentacles that terrify and can squeeze the life from sailors. Are they real? MonsterQuest goes into the deep to capture the first footage of these giant squid.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland

Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The one-hour series brings viewers tales of betrayal, buried secrets and unsung heroes, ripped from the pages of one of the nations top weekly magazines. These stories transcended news and became part of pop culture, revealing shocking twists, new evidence, and unexpected resolutions. Interlaced within every episode are exclusive interviews with Peoples journalists, archival footage, re-creations, and firsthand accounts by those closest to the investigations.

programme.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones
programme.desc: Crime documentary series hosted by Aphrodite Jones who looks into real-life crimes including some of the most atrocious murders of recent times. Jones shares details of these gruesome crimes alongside authentic footage, evidence and interviews with people associated to the case – sometimes even the perpetrator themselves. Subjects featured in the series include such high-profile cases as O. J. Simpson, Michael Jackson, the notorious Zodiac serial killer and the music producer Phil Spector. Jones attempts to get inside the minds of her subjects to better understand their motives for committing such unspeakable crimes. Aphrodite Jones is a true-crime expert, a former crime reporter for FOX News and the author of eight books.

programme.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones
programme.desc: Crime documentary series hosted by Aphrodite Jones who looks into real-life crimes including some of the most atrocious murders of recent times. Jones shares details of these gruesome crimes alongside authentic footage, evidence and interviews with people associated to the case – sometimes even the perpetrator themselves. Subjects featured in the series include such high-profile cases as O. J. Simpson, Michael Jackson, the notorious Zodiac serial killer and the music producer Phil Spector. Jones attempts to get inside the minds of her subjects to better understand their motives for committing such unspeakable crimes. Aphrodite Jones is a true-crime expert, a former crime reporter for FOX News and the author of eight books.

programme.title: Scene Of the Crime With Tony Harris
programme.desc: Scene Of the Crime With Tony Harris is a TV investigative series exploring what is hidden behind crimes, and it is a whole world. Tony Harris is a news anchor, television correspondent, and filmmaker, Emmy-Award-winning journalist and an outstanding investigator. Crimes fascinate and shock us with intricacies and unexpectedness, they happen in a small town, a hidden subculture, a criminal network, or a place that can never separate itself from a criminal event. Follow in-depth investigations and heart-breaking mysteries behind real people.

programme.title: Faking It: Tears Of A Crime
programme.desc: Hear the stories of people who committed various crimes and then used national press and media to portray themselves as grieving victims thinking they will get away with it. In this series, a team of three experts - body language expert, linguistics professor, and a criminal psychologist analyse some of the most famous modern-day UK crime stories and iconic TV appeals by those who claimed to be grief stricken but turned out to be the culprits - Ian Huntley, Oscar Pistorius, Ian Stewart, Miles Evans, Stuart Hazell and many others.

programme.title: Undercover Underage
programme.desc: Every day, countless adults utilize the internet with insidious intentions to groom, sexually exploit, and abuse children online. Committed to helping law enforcement stop these perpetrators, child advocate Roo Powell and the team at her nonprofit organization SOSA (Safe from Online Sex Abuse) work in collaboration with law enforcement to detect and identify the menacing adults who use the internet to harm children. Undercover Underage follows Roo as the 38-year-old mother of three transforms her appearance into a teen online. Once adults engage with Roos underage decoys, its a race against the clock to gather enough information to positively identify the offenders and get them on law enforcements radar.

programme.title: Undercover Underage
programme.desc: Every day, countless adults utilize the internet with insidious intentions to groom, sexually exploit, and abuse children online. programme.title: Murder Calls
programme.desc: Murder Calls is a true-crime documentary series that explores the importance of the 911 calls made to the emergency services. Each episode features the chilling calls themselves, as detectives and investigators use the given information to help them track, trace and identify the potential killers. Using extensive reenactments, Murder Calls recreates aspects of the haunting murders, showing the twists and turns detectives face as they aim to understand the motive and identify the culprits. As with many murder cases, nothing at first is what it seems.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Crime documentary series that examines homicide investigations using unfiltered footage, including body-cam, surveillance and interrogation-room footage, giving viewers a chance to follow a case from beginning to end. The series will give viewers a chance to experience how homicide cases are conducted, from the initial crime scene investigations by body cam, to home security tapes, to interrogation room footage of real confessions. Real tapes of the investigations will be combined with interviews with friends, family members, and law enforcement directly involved in the case.

programme.title: Two Shallow Graves
programme.desc: In 2019, Charles "Chase" Merritt went on trial for the murder of his friend and business associate Joseph McStay, McStays wife, and their two young sons. The prosecution presented incriminating evidence including bank records, cell phone activity, and DNA placing him in McStays car. Merritt maintained his innocence and his defense team suggested another man had motive for murder. Over the course of seven gripping parts, TWO SHALLOW GRAVES gives an enthralling and never-before-seen look at Merritts murder trial and the investigation into the McStay murders through interviews with Merritt, the prosecution, and the defense. The series sheds new light on the controversial court case that captivated the nation and the questions around the heartbreaking crime that still linger unanswered.

programme.title: Мамаша
programme.desc: Рассказ о жизни Кристи Планкетт, одинокой матери, которая преодолела свою зависимость от алкоголя и наркотиков и пытается начать жизнь заново в городе Напа, Калифорния, который является центром американского виноделия. Она работает официанткой в ресторане и посещает встречи анонимных алкоголиков. Её мать Бонни Планкетт, также как и дочь, справилась с зависимостью от алкоголя и наркотиков и хочет наладить отношения с дочерью. Семнадцатилетняя дочь Вайолет, родившаяся, когда Кристи было всего 16 лет, ждет ребёнка от своего приятеля Люка. У Кристи также есть второй ребёнок - Роско, от бывшего парня по имени Бакстер. У Бакстера нет работы, он не платит алименты Кристи, а его планы о заработке денег связаны с продажей наркотиков.

programme.title: Мамаша
programme.desc: Рассказ о жизни Кристи Планкетт, одинокой матери, которая преодолела свою зависимость от алкоголя и наркотиков и пытается начать жизнь заново в городе Напа, Калифорния, который является центром американского виноделия. programme.title: Клерк
programme.desc: Женя Скороходов - обычный клерк. Он заканчивает Финансовую академию, работает операционистом в банке. Его серую жизнь скрашивает безнадежная влюбленность в красавицу-коллегу Вику. Как-то в обеденный перерыв Женя развлекает Вику и коллег тем, что придумывает план идеального ограбления их банка. На следующий день происходит ограбление. Главный подозреваемый - Женя. С риском для жизни он начинает собственное расследование, в ходе которого, понимает, что Вика совсем не та, за кого себя выдает.

programme.title: Ловушка
programme.desc: Главе самого мощного городского мафиозного клана удалось прекратить криминальные войны. Казалось бы, он наконец-то может уйти на покой, передав дела своим молодым и дерзким помощникам. Но те слишком рьяно берутся за дело: быстро удваивают доходы, но своими жесткими методами вызывают волну всеобщего недовольства. Мечта крестного отца о тихой жизни никак не осуществится - ему постоянно приходится вмешиваться, чтобы сохранить мир. Однако о мире приходится забыть, когда после 12-ти лет тюрьмы в город возвращается крупный криминальный авторитет, готовый любой ценой вернуть утраченные позиции.

programme.title: Утро
programme.desc: Утренняя новостная программа Настоящего времени.

programme.title: Ждём в гости
programme.desc: Проект Ирины Хангошвили о культуре, истории и традициях различных стран мира. Ведущий - Зураб Двали - путешествует и приглашает зрителей пройтись вместе с ним по красивым местам, увидеть достопримечательности, полюбоваться природой и познакомиться с интересными людьми. Всюду гостеприимные хозяева говорят нашим телезрителям: "Ждем в гости!" Зрители сначала узнают интересные исторические факты о самых известных или забытых регионах различных стран, и затем останавливаются на кулинарных традициях - готовят несколько блюд с гостями программы.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. Основная изюминка сериала – остроумный характер комедии, где на первый план выходят семейные отношения: с любящей, но часто критичной женой, Деброй, детьми, а также с навязчивыми родителями и завистливым братом, которые живут через дорогу. Сериал идеально подойдёт для тех, кто хочет смотреть лёгкие и забавные истории о семейной жизни. Серию за серией, комедийные ситуации создают атмосферу доброты и юмора.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. programme.title: Нарисуй меня счастливой
programme.desc: Люба выросла в детдоме, рано вышла замуж и также рано овдовела. Её муж вёл разгульную жизнь — пил, играл в карты и в итоге погиб в драке. Люба была вынуждена браться за любую работу, чтобы обеспечить взрослую дочь Леру и властную свекровь Анну Борисовну. Теперь, несмотря на свой художественный талант, Люба работает маляром. На ней держится весь дом, но семья совсем не ценит её усилия. На Любу обращает внимание Антон Павлович — хозяин дома, где она делает ремонт. А вскоре за Любой начинает ухаживать приезжий электрик Самир. Однако дочь и свекровь делают всё, чтобы помешать её счастью. Когда Люба осознаёт, что родным нужны от неё только деньги, она решает уйти из дома…

programme.title: С чистого листа
programme.desc: Даша Ермакова накануне свадьбы расстаётся с женихом и переезжает в Москву, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. Не найдя достойную работу и жильё, она соглашается на подработку у известного психотерапевта Михаила Литовченко. Вскоре она подвергается нападению, получает сильное сотрясение мозга и теряет память. А когда приходит в себя, ей говорят, что она — Ирина Литовченко, жена Михаила. Даше предстоит разобраться, кто она на самом деле, вспомнить свою любовь, которую она встретила незадолго до трагических событий, а еще выяснить, куда и почему пропала настоящая Ирина Литовченко.
